title: The Cloudspotter's Guide -  contrails and clouds

content.question: According to the passage, the relationship between aircraft contrails and cirriform clouds is best expressed by which of the following?

choices.label: Aircraft contrails decrease the number of cirriform clouds that form.
Aircraft contrails have no significant impact on the number of cirriform clouds that form.
Aircraft contrails increase the number of cirriform clouds that form.
Aircraft contrails are only one of many sources of cirriform clouds.

content.answer: Aircraft contrails increase the number of cirriform clouds that form.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
